title: Exquisite Black Beads Chain - Double Strand Mangalsutra
features: This elegant necklace features a double strand of meticulously strung, faceted black beads, creating a subtle sparkle. The beads are connected with delicate 22K gold chain, resulting in a refined, minimalist design. The chain features a spring clasp ensuring a secure fit. The necklace is designed with flexibility in mind, allowing it to drape gracefully around the neckline.
occasions: anniversaries. Ideal as a subtle Mangalsutra alternative or a thoughtful gift for a loved one.
description: This necklace combines traditional elements with modern aesthetics, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The high-quality 22K gold ensures lasting brilliance, while the black beads offer a touch of sophistication. The double-strand design adds depth and dimension, making it a truly unique piece. Perfect for everyday wear, this necklace embodies simplicity and elegance.
